item.title: Contrastive Predictive Coding
item.description: Contrastive Predictive Coding, aka CPC, is an autoregressive model combined with InfoNCE loss1. There are two key ideas in CPC: Autoregressive models in latent space, and InfoNCE loss that combines mutual information and [[NCE]] Noise Contrastive Estimation: NCE Noise contrastive estimation (NCE) objective function is1 $$ \mathcal L = \mathbb E_{x, x^{+}, x^{-}} \left[ - \ln \frac{ C(x, x^{+})}{ C(x,x^{+}) + C(x,x^{-}) } \right], $$ where $x^{+}$ represents data similar to $x$, $x^{-}$ represents data dissimilar to $x$, $C(\cdot, \cdot)$ is a function to compute the similarities.
